title: Samsung opens up One UI 4.1 beta program for the Galaxy M31 and Galaxy M32 in India
content:
Samsung has just announced One UI 4.1 beta program for the Galaxy M31 and Galaxy M32, allowing users to try out an early version of the new software ahead of the public release. The beta program comes shortly after Samsung started rolling out a stable One UI 4.1 update to the Galaxy Z Flip 3

The post Samsung opens up One UI 4.1 beta program for the Galaxy M31 and Galaxy M32 in India appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Samsung has just announced One UI 4.1 beta program for the Galaxy M31 and Galaxy M32. Here's what you need to know.
